channel.title: [Request] Custom Signature
channel.description:
Hey could i get a signature?
Text is "Jared"
Image: http://abduzeedo.com/creating-smoke (thats a link to a tutorial on how to create it but yea =\ that image if you could please) Text: electric like, colors either white or yellow maybe? idk, whichever fits image good
I hope i've said enough so i wont get a signature like that one guy did in a stickied topic. lol. anyways, if you need me to be more specific just post okay?
